head.title: Heinz Expands Ties With DDB Needham

hedline.hl1: Heinz Expands Ties With DDB Needham

block.p: The H. J. Heinz Company said yesterday that it would expand its relationship with the DDB Needham Worldwide unit of Omnicom Group by naming DDB Needham San Francisco to handle the account of the Smart Ones line of frozen entrees and desserts sold by the Weight Watchers Gourmet Food Company. Billings on the account, handled for a year by Jordan McGrath Case & Partners in New York, were estimated at $8 million to $10 million.

The H. J. Heinz Company said yesterday that it would expand its relationship with the DDB Needham Worldwide unit of Omnicom Group by naming DDB Needham San Francisco to handle the account of the Smart Ones line of frozen entrees and desserts sold by the Weight Watchers Gourmet Food Company. Billings on the account, handled for a year by Jordan McGrath Case & Partners in New York, were estimated at $8 million to $10 million.

DDB Needham San Francisco was awarded the account after a five-month review that also included Jordan McGrath and Bozell Worldwide in New York, part of True North Communications. DDB Needham already handles Heinz products like Ore-Ida and ketchup.
